l1rotation: Identify Loading Vectors under Sparsity in Factor Models

Source: R/l1rotation-package.R
l1rotation-package.Rd

Estimate loading vectors using the l1 criterion as proposed in Freyaldenhoven (2025) https://simonfreyaldenhoven.github.io/papers/factor_rotation.pdf. Given a data matrix, find the rotation of the loading matrix with the smallest l1-norm and/or test for the presence of local factors.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/SimonFreyaldenhoven/l1rotation

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/SimonFreyaldenhoven/l1rotation/issues
